data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł, Newton, Alfred F. (2017): Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4344 (3): 401-443, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.3.1
